title: Yet another minimum amount capsule. wow.
body:
Ive only gotten to lvl 34
1st capsule, 1 champion, tahm kench
2nd capsule, 3 90 BE and one 270, Ashe, Sivir, ____ and veigar
3rd capsule, my best yet, xin zhao and leblanc
4th capsule, Garen, Gangplank, Ryze.

Just me or is my 2nd and 4th already low rolls and 1st and 3rd low mid rolls? like wth 12-16 games about a level so far for about 1000 be a game? why not just give me that. this really just annoys me really, its boring working on RNG for the essence, no fun in it.

replies.body:
the second capsule should be 3 90's, and 2 270's, if it wasn't you should contact support, as this is the minimum.

And honestly, low rolling is probably a ~50% occurance, and due to maths, has a minimum of ~33% chance of occuring assuming that Riot doesn't use bad luck prevention methods.

New system is bullshit, and everyone knows it.

Watch LoL die.
